Key1.translation: Hello, ^^USER_NAME^^. Here is some new text.
Key1.translation-note: ^^username^^ will be the first name, e.g. Mary

Key2.translation: Hello, ^^USER_NAME^^. We're testing a pull request
Key2.translation-note: ^^username^^ will be the first name, e.g. John

Key3.translation: Copyright 2017 Let's see how the translations get  pulling into the GitHub Repo
